commands.name: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule create
commands.summary: Create an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.
examples: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule create --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send Listen

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule delete
commands.summary: Delete an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.
examples: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule list
commands.summary: List a list of authorization rules for a Namespace.
examples: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule list --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule show
commands.summary: Get an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace by rule name.
examples: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule update
commands.summary: Update an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule update [--add]
                                                 [--authorization-rule-name]
                                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--namespace-name]
                                                 [--remove]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--rights]
                                                 [--set]
                                                 [--subscription]
examples: az eventhubs namespace authorization-rule update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send
